vocabInfos.shortDef: to be quiet, remain silent; to be calm, not agitated
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to be quiet, remain silent; to be calm, not agitated
to be silent, keep silence, hold one's peace, Mt. 20:31; 26:63; Mk. 3:4; 9:34; 10:48; 14:61; Lk. 19:40; Acts 18:9; σιωπῶν, silent, dumb, Lk. 1:20; metaphorically to be silent, still, hushed, calm, not agitated as the sea, Mk. 4:39*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: guardar silencio o callarse ; dejar de hablar : aplacar (el mar) ; tú quedarás mudo y no podrás hablar (LUC.1:20)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 保持緘默, 不出聲, 不發一言
2) 停止說話, 安靜下來
